body.p: As part of the review of topics recently considered by the FASB, the Board discussed the requirements of SFAS 144 Accounting for the Impairment or Disposal of Long‑Lived Assets, as they relate to assets held for sale and discontinued operations. The Board did not consider the requirements of SFAS 144 relating to the impairment of assets held for use. Impairment of such assets is an issue that is being addressed in the IASB research project on measurement being led by the Canadian Accounting Standards Board.
